TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p ɹ iː ð k ɔː z t ɛ l ɚ æ t h ɚ t ə ɹ eɪ ŋ ð iː z n s w ɪ ð h ɚ f m ɚ ð ə s t ɔː s ɪ k s p ɔː n s ʌ f əl f ɹ æ ʃ ɚ n oʊ p iː θ f aɪ v s ɪ k s ɹ ɛ v ɹ əl z ʌ v b l uː t iː θ æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s s n ɛ k ɚ f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɔː w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː p ɹ ɛ s t eɪ k s n ɛ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t ɔː f ɹ ɔː ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k iː θ s iː k aɪ n s k uː f ð iː s ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t uː θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ k s æ n d w iː w ɪ ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ w ɪ n d ᵻ æ t ð ə t ɹ iː n s d eɪ ʃ ə n
